statements: SELECT * FROM speech_violations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT violation_id, violation_type, country FROM speech_violations WHERE severity > 5;
SELECT reporter_name, violation_date FROM speech_violations WHERE violation_type='Hate Speech';
SELECT * FROM speech_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31';
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM speech_violations GROUP BY country ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT * FROM speech_violations WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY violation_date DESC, severity ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT violation_type, count(*) AS total_violations FROM speech_violations GROUP BY violation_type HAVING total_violations > 10 ORDER BY total_violations DESC
SELECT reporter_name, country, violation_date FROM speech_violations WHERE violation_type='Censorship' AND severity >= 3 ORDER BY violation_date ASC
SELECT * FROM speech_violations WHERE country='China' AND violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY severity DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT DISTINCT country FROM speech_violations ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM freedom_of_speech_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) AS total_violations FROM freedom_of_speech_violations GROUP BY country HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT trend_description, trend_category FROM speech_trends WHERE trend_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM speech_trends ORDER BY trend_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;
SELECT country, violation_type, COUNT(violation_id) AS num_violations FROM freedom_of_speech_violations GROUP BY country, violation_type;
SELECT violation_type, violation_date FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE violation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT trend_category, trend_date FROM speech_trends ORDER BY trend_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT country, violation_type FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Censorship' ORDER BY country ASC;
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations;
SELECT id, violation_date, country FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE violation_type = 'Censorship';
SELECT violation_type, COUNT(*) as total_violations FROM freedom_of_speech_violations GROUP BY violation_type;
SELECT country, COUNT(*) as total_violations FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE violation_date >= '2021-01-01' GROUP BY country;
SELECT id, location_name, city, region FROM speech_violation_locations WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY violation_date DESC, penalty_type ASC;
SELECT id, trend_date, trend_type FROM speech_violation_trends WHERE trend_description LIKE '%censorship%' ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT violation_type, country, COUNT(*) AS num_violations FROM freedom_of_speech_violations GROUP BY violation_type, country ORDER BY num_violations DESC;
SELECT location_name, country, city FROM speech_violation_locations WHERE region = 'Europe' AND city = 'Paris';
SELECT trend_date, trend_type, trend_description FROM speech_violation_trends WHERE trend_type IN ('Government Censorship', 'Online Harassment') ORDER BY trend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations;
SELECT country, violation_type, violation_date FROM freedom_of_speech_violations;
SELECT violation_id, country, violation_type, penalty FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE violation_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM speech_violation_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT city, state, country FROM speech_violation_locations WHERE violation_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM freedom_of_speech_violations;
SELECT country, violation_type, violation_date FROM freedom_of_speech_violations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT violation_id, country, violation_type, penalty FROM freedom_of_speech_violations ORDER BY violation_date DESC;

SELECT r.report_id, r.reporter_name, v.country, l.city FROM speech_violation_reports AS r JOIN freedom_of_speech_violations AS v ON r.violation_id = v.violation_id JOIN speech_violation_locations AS l ON v.violation_id = l.violation_id;
SELECT trend_id, violation_type, year, total_violations FROM speech_violation_trends WHERE year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY total_violations DESC;
SELECT * FROM violations;
SELECT id, date, location FROM violations WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM violators WHERE age > 30;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'Cyber%';
SELECT location_name, region, country FROM locations WHERE region = 'North America';
SELECT * FROM violations
SELECT name, age, nationality FROM violators WHERE age > 30
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT v.date, v.location, l.country FROM violations v JOIN locations l ON v.location = l.location_name
SELECT m.id, v.description, t.trend_description FROM monitoring m JOIN violations v ON m.violation_id = v.id JOIN trends t ON m.trend_id = t.id
